title: 820 3437, No green light - PPBUS 8,23v
message:
Hey guys,

working on 820 3437 board, apparently no signs of liquid or kind of stuff and no components knock off. 

This one sounds like a SMC problem. 

PPBUS - 8,23v
SMC_RESET_L - 3.4V

already did the SMC dancing with Flux, already replace U7100 for a new one.. No changes.. 

My question is, can i replace the SMC from a 820 000165 donor board??? or i will need to buy a 820 3437 donor board?? 

Thanks

title: 820 3437, No green light - PPBUS 8,23v
message:
Why do you want to replace it so fast?
Post exact diode mode readings for SCL/SDA of battery bus; also the voltages.

In case of replace, MUST get it from 3437 board...

title: 820 3437, No green light - PPBUS 8,23v
message:
i forgot to mentioned that i I had already measured the SCL/SDA ... and seems OK! i have learned from you.. 

SMBUS_SMC_5_G3_SCL - 0.492V

SMBUS_SMC_5_G3_SDA - 0.492V

i will order a 3437 board and replace the SMC! And after that i will post the results! thanks
